unnormalised: Organic farming is awesome! My nani in Kerala always said, "back to basics!" Feels healthier, right? Heard IIT Kanpur is doing some research on this too. Though, yields can be tricky, like during the 2018 floods. Anyone know good organic fertilizer sources near Patna? Thinking of starting a small patch on my land on 26/01/2024 at 10:00 am. Need to prep by 15/12/2023. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Organic farming is awesome! My nani in Kerala always said, "back to basics!" Feels healthier, right? Heard I I T Kanpur is doing some research on this too. Though, yields can be tricky, like during the two thousand and eighteen floods. Anyone know good organic fertilizer sources near Patna? Thinking of starting a small patch on my land on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four at ten a m. Need to prep by fifteenth december two thousand and twenty three. Jai Kisan!
